remarks: Lemma for ~ abelth .  The peculiar region ` S ` , known as a _Stolz angle_ , is a teardrop-shaped subset of the closed unit ball containing ` 1 ` .  Indeed, except for ` 1 ` itself, the rest of the Stolz angle is enclosed in the open unit ball.  (Contributed by Mario Carneiro, 31-Mar-2015.)

abelth.4 $e |- ( ph -> 0 <_ M ) $.
abelth.5 $e |- S = { z e. CC | ( abs ` ( 1 - z ) ) <_ ( M x. ( 1 - ( abs ` z ) ) ) } $.
abelthlem2 $p |- ( ph -> ( 1 e. S /\ ( S \ { 1 } ) C_ ( 0 ( ball ` ( abs o. - ) ) 1 ) ) ) $.
